header.title: Super Mario Bros fans think Nintendo has confirmed Luigi is transgender
header.postText: It looks like 20 gay-teen didn’t end with the tolling of the bells at midnight on 31 December, because we have a new LGBTQ+ icon on our hands.', 'It has been decided that Luigi of Super Mario Bros fame is transgender and we are welcoming them with open arms.', 'This theory became canon in the minds of many gamers after Nintendo’s update on the Super-Crown in New Super Mario Bros Deluxe, the Nintendo Switch rerelease for New Super Mario Bros. U and New Super Luigi U.', 'The Super-Crown temporarily turns Toadette into Peachette, which fans took to mean that any character could transform into a female – meaning Bowser could become Bowsette.', 'Nintendo decided to nip this theory in the bud on the game’s website, writing: ‘“When Toadette finds one of these, she can transform into the super-powered Peachette. (Sorry Luigi—only Toadette can use this item!)’', 'Now, Luigi has been known to try on a dress from time to time in the past – take the plumber crossdressing as Peach to trick Bowletta into releasing the real Princess Peach in Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga.', 'However, when Toadette puts on the Super-Crown, she’s not only given Peach’s dress, but Peach’s body.', '', '', '', 'I know that it’s probably getting annoying but I will continue posting about the fact that Luigi is canonically trans until the day I fucking die (except not right now because I gotta get some sleep gn)', '— FrostyMac 2 (@FrostymacH) January 6, 2019', '', 'Trans Lesbian Luigi pride flag pic.twitter.com/66ZonygALL', '— Kayla ? (@kob_critic) January 6, 2019', '', 'Adding more weight to the theory is Yoshi calling Luigi ‘mama’ in Super Mario World, and all of the times Luigi wears dresses or remarks how comfortable they look throughout the series.', 'We don’t know if Luigi is actually transgender, or is cisgender, or is gender non-conforming – but we support them no matter what.
